channel.title: [317] Zerker Scape devlopment [317]~~VB~~Dedi
channel.description:
Hello am looking for a devlopment team for me and my friends server
We will call it Zerker Scape
[IMG]http://i1117.photobucket.com/albums/k582/omarsoliman1/vbulletin4_logo.png[/img]
*We are planing to get real big like hold 100+ ppl and more more more .
*We wont scam on hajak u in any kind .
*We will need real coders source coders and client coders .
*If u wanna join this team tell me or add my msn omarsoliman90@hotmail.com .
Site is Zerker-Scape.co.uk . * What do we need to accomplish: -Vote for cash . -Adding the combat style icons in front of the damage. -Better cb system . -Make it hold 100+ players. -Fix memleaks etc. -Add new stuff. -Add summoing . -Add hunter. -Add overloads. -Add Frost dragons --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Important info :-
We have a payed domain and vb fourms not nulled . 12gb dedi.
We just need players and good coders.
0/3 source coders 0/2 client coders 1/2 website coders . darkwings 0/1 vb coders.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Application:
Name: Email Address: What time zone are you in?: How long you have been into RSPS's?: How long you have coded (If picked Server/Client/Website Coder)?: How long are you on a day?: Why do you want the position you picked?:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-Vote for cash .
-Adding the combat style icons in front of the damage.
-Fix memleaks etc.
-Add new stuff.
-Add summoing .
-Add hunter. (a stretch but work a try)
-Add overloads.
-Add Frost dragons (if they have the NPC)

It should already be able to hold 100+ especially with out dedicated.
